Topic.Title: Should unlisted games display similar games?

Posts.EditableText:
I was just wondering...

Every one I clicked said it was uncategorized and awaiting the moderator, so these might not be unlisted -- just circumstantial, but it seems like an unlisted game shouldn't show you games in the same category, seeming how it technically has no category.

I'm not complaining.  This doesn't bother me.

I don't care if the suggestions link to one of my example games or unfinished/abandoned projects, but some people may not be too fond of the idea.
